title: Well damn.
body:
Friend asked me today what the point of life was, so I was like "Life is pointless, we're essentially born to die and what we do in-between is irrelevant" and now they think I'm depressed.

What should I do friends?

replies.body: Ignoring the fact that the silhouette of Mewtwo distractedly looks like a bra.
what does lingerie have to do with that quote.

> [{quoted}](name=KingDinger,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=qj9wU18A,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2014-12-21T08:13:41.306+0000)
>
> what does lingerie have to do with that quote.

It is supposed to be a drawing of Mewtwo, the Pokemon. If you look closely, it isn't actually lingerie. (I got confused at first as well)
troll post pointing out the obvious....

Life is meant to be enjoyed, but unfortunately not a lot of people get much enjoyment out of life.
People end up in jobs they hate
As you get older more and more responsibilities (finances, children, cooking, cleaning etc.)
Realising people out there are much more worse of than you (personally I couldn't be truly happy if I was rich and living in an awesome house while millions of people around the world lived in dumps)
Play more League, you obviously haven't had enough.

Life is not meaningless, it's actually full of meanings.

But too bad while our technologies evolves like explosions, our society is still the same as how we were back in the stone age or medieval days. Technologies were created to serve us but now it's the other way around. Just like how society was meant to keep people together but now it's controlling us.

In this strange world, most people who actually get a taste of their dream pretty much only achieve that through luck. Either you're born in the right time or family, lucky to hit big (not starving due to how unpopular you were in whatever you're doing), avoiding jails, not getting sent to hospital or psychiatrist, not getting people backstabbing you and stole all the credit etc.

I am not wishing for some kind of "revolution" because as we can see from history, it clearly doesn't work. I simply wish countries can stop with economic growth and world domination non-sense for a bit, and let Humanity to actually develop for the first time in a long, long while.

EDIT: But no worries there are games and animes, so choose your poison. {{champion:32}}

The point of life is to find out what it means to you. Everyone has a different meaning to there reason for life. It can be about finding out who and what is most important to you while you are alive. Or what you want to do before you die.
